Reviews.Title: Piece of junk!
Reviews.Author: Leroy J. Wendt
Reviews.Content: This is a total piece of junk. The field of view is very tiny and it requires bright daylight to record anything. During the evening with normal household lighting it records nothing but shadows. No audio, just video.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre
Reviews.Author: Suzanne C. Turner
Reviews.Content: It looks and behaves like a normal clock. Programming only offers a 24 hour clock, not a daily setting.  For example, I wanted to video M-T from 6am-6pm and shorter times on W-F so it would have to be reprogrammed or you risk running out of memory faster.  I tried a larger memory chip, but the card gets extremely hot.  You can't designate certain times for each day.  This combined with the small memory forces me to empty the card each evening - I found this to be inconvenient.  It does work, but the image quality isn't great.  Had to keep it on the lowest grade so it wouldn't consume the memory. Overall it performs good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy usage -picture quality can be improved
Reviews.Author: 2liveCrew
Reviews.Content: Bought it from Amazon.  Item came earlier than expected - super prompt delivery. This item was easy to set up for use as per  instructions provided. Used a 16gb SD card instead of the 2gb provided and it work just fine. One comment though, picture quality under dim lights can be improved.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Thomas Gregoretti "Tommy G"
Reviews.Content: The directions are not written well so I needed some questions answered.  I emailed, no response.  I called, they didn't call back.  I plan on sending the unit back.

Reviews.Title: good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: paul f tomasello
Reviews.Content: Nice product didnt realize I had to take the back off to remove the sd card.  Slight inconvenience for the situation I am using the product.

Reviews.Title: Not what I Expected
Reviews.Author: DSW
Reviews.Content: In order to program it, it has to be hooked up to a TV, which is find... but, they fail to tell you that it DOES NOT have an internal battery to save those settings.  In other words, you have to set a TV up wherever you want to record so this thing runs like you want.  Once you unplug it and move it, it loses it's setting.  I sent it back.  It was not what I expected, but found another one that does exactly what I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Ronald J. Rickey
Reviews.Content: I have had several, and in the same price range, this is not worth the time, will return it, in a bright room it is dark, and very poor picture, its almost like looking thougha cheece cloth, first time i have bought junk from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: basically good, but...
Reviews.Author: veneziano
Reviews.Content: overall it is good.PROS: many selections. For example, set to video manually, motion, or at specific time during day. With many "bells and whistles". Can transfer SD card to PC for viewing.CONS: clock needs to be connected to a television monitor to see and set the settings. Power by A/C, no battery backup in case of electricity outage and settings are deleted. No USB connection for PC operation/setting or viewing of video.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this:(
Reviews.Author: Martin Wiesenthal
Reviews.Content: It has no audio at all.  The few buttons that it has make it difficult to use. Has no battery backup so it is difficult to move from the TV on which you view the programming screens to the position that you want to use for observation. Instructions are poor, cost is too high. Don't get burned on this like we did.

Reviews.Title: records great
Reviews.Author: T. Warren "gone natural"
Reviews.Content: This camera records well .. a good crisp picture when playing on computer... would like it to have sound. But was great investment, easy set up and use

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: MAC
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and is totally not noticable as a hidden camera.  I use it for home monitoring when I am not home..I recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: low light performance
Reviews.Author: GEORGE PETRYKEVYCH
Reviews.Content: great product. poor performance in low light condition. would pay a little more if it did have night capabilities. otherwise as expected

Reviews.Title: Nov. 1 2013 Product has failed. First unit ...
Reviews.Author: T. Hess
Reviews.Content: Nov. 1 2013 Product has failed. First unit: SD card is blank, no files and screen is all blotchy on setup, setup functions are no longer evident, controls, do not work. I bought two units, will now check the second for function, it is in my suitcase and used during travel at hotels. Both were purchased in May, one is junk in November and all files lost for last trip. I cleared old files and set up unit the night before we left. Came back to no files on SD Card. It is plugged into a power brownout protector so power fluctuation should not be the cause.  In this order I also bought a separate different type of unit and it never worked either. Mounted it to a shed outside and came back to no files on very first trip. Left it up as a dummy but is not working.

Reviews.Title: NOT TOO SURE
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM OSBORNE
Reviews.Content: IT IS BUILT WELL, STURDY, BRIGHT LIGHTS, BUT NO AUDIO! I DIDN'T REALIZE THAT UPON ORDERING.  ALSO, I FILL UP THE CARD AND DELETED IT ALL.  NOW I'M NOT GETTING ANY R ECORDING, PERHAPS IT NEED TO BE PROGRAMMED AGAIN VIA TV, IF SO, NOT SO PRACTICAL, ALSO, KINDA PRICEY, FOR NO SOUND

Reviews.Title: Michael
Reviews.Author: michael taylor
Reviews.Content: I do wish it had a battery backup to keep the video synchronized I n case the power goes off in the home.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: Very good, except that you can't record voice. Beside that, it is a very good alarm clock security that can be use in any place

Reviews.Title: Poor video
Reviews.Author: Doug Gaddis
Reviews.Content: The video quality is very poor.  For this kind of money you expect a whole lot more than this.  Don't buy it.  Get dropcam

Reviews.Title: no good!
Reviews.Author: Ruth Bulot
Reviews.Content: The video didn't work long at all. The clock still works though. Spent way too much money for something that didn't work long!

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: john an
Reviews.Content: It is not ease to operate.do not like.spend money for nothing.waste of my time and money.do not buy this item .

Reviews.Title: Does as advertised
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: It is just unimagineable the things you can find out with this little clock/camera!! Great for any soul that wants peace of mind in certain situations. Just make sur eyou remember to turn it off when you dont need it.

Reviews.Title: Not good as advertised
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: The camera did not hold up to the description.  The recording range only goes out to maybe 5 feet and even then it is not that clear but beyond that is is not clear at all.  The stop button does not work.  The DVR features are not very user friendly.  Dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad device
Reviews.Author: Ziggy
Reviews.Content: I actually think this clock camera is not that bad.Pros:- Clock and alarm setup is easy.  Simply set the side switch to Time or Alarm and press the Hour or Minutes buttons on top.- Camera is practically invisible.  You will need to shine a light directly into it to see where it is.- Use of SD card.  I did not want an external recording device so the SD fit my requirement.- Adjustable frame capture.  Options on how many frames per second that the video will capture.  Memory usage will depend on setup.  With mine, 100mb is equivalent to about 1hr50min at 2 fps.- Motion detection.  Haven't tried this one yet but I like the fact that the option is available.- Simple manual record start/stop.  Just pop off the cover (I did not re-install the small screw that comes with it), press REC or STOP, and replace the cover.Cons:- Video images are not that bright.  However, this may be due to the plastic cover that is necessarily tinted to hide the presence of the camera.- No audio.  But then again, audio is not a requirement for me.- Requirement of video connection for initial setup.  You will need to hook up the video output to configure the camera.  Afterwards, I just remove the SD card when I want to review the videos in my computer.Pretty quick delivery too.  Arrived in about 3 days for me.

Reviews.Title: quick delivery
Reviews.Author: eljay
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a chance to actually use my product, but I was happy with how fast it got here.  I looks exactly like what I wanted and am quite satisfied so far.  It looks like a regular clock and came with all the equipment and adapters.

ProductInfo.Features:
Covert DVR Disguised as an Alarm Clock; Fully Functional Alarm Clock
Motion Activated Recording; High Quality MPEG-4 Compression
Record over a month of Footage with the included 2GB SD card; 24/7 Lifetime Live Customer Support
Easily Connect to a TV or Monitor; Compatible with High Capacity SD Memory Cards up to 32GB
24 Hour Scheduled Recording
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT PI300-SD Covert Fully Functional Alarm Clock Security DVR with Built-in Color Pinhole Surveillance Spy Camera and 2GB SD Card
